co.cask.cdap.api.spark

Interface SparkSpecification

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ProgramSpecification, PropertyProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultSparkSpecification

    public interface SparkSpecification
extends ProgramSpecification, PropertyProvider
    This class provides the specification for a Spark job. Create instances of this class via the SparkSpecification.Builder class by invoking the SparkSpecification.Builder.with() method.

    Example: 

     SparkSpecification spec =
     new SparkSpecification.Builder.with()
       .setName("AggregateMetricsByTag")
       .setDescription("Aggregates metrics values by tag")
       .setMainClass("com.example.SomeJob")
       .build();

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  SparkSpecification.Builder
      Builder for building SparkSpecification.
